LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_non_yoke_mast_code()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the code for the OCS pole, as a concatenation of the mast's reference mileage km-value and the current 'seq' local variable.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_Spanlength()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the shortest span length [m] between this catenary mast and its related next mast.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthDisplay()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the shortest span length [m].
LuaFunction.Formula:
--[[ _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthDisplay.lua 2022-10-09_002 CLFEY Wrapped function as a function call, refactored the code, don't show "-0.0-".
It is assumed that Spanlength holds either a plain number [Double], or a collection of collections holding each one contact wire name [String] and its corresponding spanlength [Double].
The return value has format:
Show this: ...if property Spanlength is: ================================= ========================================================= "" ...the number 0 "-36.7-" ...a non-zero number (e.g. 36.7) "L30-515 -57.8-" ...a collection of just one collection {{string,double}} "L30-536 -52.6- / L30-537 -37.8-" ...a collection of several collections {{string,double},...,{string,double}}
Note: If the Spanlength property contains several pairs of {wireName,spanlength} then the OCS pole number is shown first.
--]] function _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthDisplay() if type(Spanlength) == "number" then --Spanlength holds just a plain number (most OCS poles have just one spanlength): return Spanlength == 0 and "" or string.format("-%.01f-",Spanlength) elseif type(Spanlength) == "table" then --[[ The Spanlength property holds a collection of N collections as shown in this example: {{WireName1,Spanlength1},{WireName2,Spanlength2}, ... , {WireNameN,SpanlengthN}} where WireNameX is the contact wire's name property [string], and SpanlengthX is the corresponding spanlength [Double]. --]] Spanlengths = getCollectionFromTable(Spanlength) nSpanlengths = getCollectionLength(Spanlength) for i = 0,nSpanlengths-1 do distance2D = Spanlengths[i][1] if i == 0 then --First spanlength: s = distance2D == 0 and "" or string.format("%s -%.01f-",Spanlengths[i][0],Spanlengths[i][1]) --wireName,spanlength else s = s..string.format(" / %s -%.01f-",Spanlengths[i][0],Spanlengths[i][1]) end end else return "Unexpected Spanlength type ["..type(Spanlength).."]." end return s end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthTextPosition()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns a World Coordinate System offset vector for the span length custom text attribute, by default from the object's insertion point to halfway between the concerned masts' display points. Optionally, specify offsets as [lateralOffset [,longitudinalOffset]]).
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthTextPosition(offsetLateral,offsetAlong) scale = DocumentData.Document.Database.Cannoscale.Scale --CAD system's annotative scale offsetLateral = (offsetLateral or 0)/scale offsetAlong = (offsetAlong or 0)/scale worldOffsetX,worldOffsetY = RC__getWcsVectorFromAcsVector(offsetLateral,offsetAlong) local r,n = getRelatedObjects(rel_OcsPole_HasNext_OcsPole) if n == 0 then return {worldOffsetX,worldOffsetY} else local target = r[0]
--Offset from object's insertion point to the midpoint between the displaypoints for the masts that are involved: local startX = geoCoord.X + SymbolOffset.X local startY = geoCoord.Y + SymbolOffset.Y local endX = target.geoCoord.X + target.SymbolOffset.X local endY = target.geoCoord.Y + target.SymbolOffset.Y
return { SymbolOffset.X + (endX - startX)/2 + worldOffsetX, SymbolOffset.Y + (endY - startY)/2 + worldOffsetY } end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthTextRotation()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the text attribute's rotation [DD] for the shortest span length custom text attribute, to place the text nicely between its two masts' display points.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_MAS_SpanlengthTextRotation() local r,n = getRelatedObjects(rel_OcsPole_HasNext_OcsPole) if n == 0 then return AlignmentTangent else local target = r[0]
--WCS angle between the displaypoints for the masts that are involved: local startX = geoCoord.X + SymbolOffset.X local startY = geoCoord.Y + SymbolOffset.Y local endX = target.geoCoord.X + target.SymbolOffset.X local endY = target.geoCoord.Y + target.SymbolOffset.Y return math.deg(math.atan(endY - startY, endX - startX)) + (MileageIncreasesTowardsLeft and 180 or 0) end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_otherObjectsToModelcheck()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the number of other items to modelcheck, and a table with references to them.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_MAS_otherObjectsToModelcheck() sYoke1 = rel_OcsPole_IsSupportFor_OcsPortal sYoke2 = rel_OcsPole_IsDropArmUnder_OcsPortal sMast = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole sSuspensionMast = rel_OcsPortal_IsDropArmSupportFor_OcsPole t = {} --Collection of other objects to check txt = "{" first = true rYoke1,nYoke1 = getRelatedObjects(sYoke1) rYoke2,nYoke2 = getRelatedObjects(sYoke2) rYoke = getUnionOfCollections({rYoke1,rYoke2}) nYoke = nYoke1 + nYoke2 for j = 0,nYoke-1 do table.insert(t,rYoke[j]) txt = first and "{"..RC__identify(rYoke[j]) or txt..","..RC__identify(rYoke[j]) first = false rMast,nMast = getRelatedObjects(sMast,rYoke[j]) for i = 0, nMast-1 do if rMast[i].id ~= this.id then table.insert(t,rMast[i]) txt = txt..","..RC__identify(rMast[i]) end end rSuspensionMast,nSuspensionMast = getRelatedObjects(sSuspensionMast,rYoke[j]) for i = 0, nSuspensionMast-1 do if rSuspensionMast[i].id ~= this.id then table.insert(t,rSuspensionMast[i]) txt = txt..","..RC__identify(rSuspensionMast[i]) end end n = nMast + nSuspensionMast return n,t,_info(n..": "..txt.."}") end return 0,{},_info(first and "{}" or txt) end

CustomAttribute.Name: NewOrExisting
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) mast's age [Ny | Eksisterende].

CustomAttribute.Name: Spanlength
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length (sl) [m] denotes the distance traveled along the associated alignment's reference alignment (projected onto the XY plane) from this mast to the closest next mast, related using '"..rel_OcsPole_HasNext_OcsPole.."'/'"..rel_OcsPole_HasPrevious_OcsPole.."'.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthDisplay
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length value [m] being displayed close to the OCS pole.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetLateral
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text lateral offset along [m] denotes the distance, transversal to the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetAlong
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text along-offset [m] denotes the distance, along the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_OtherObjectsToBeModelchecked
CustomAttribute.Description: If this OCS pole supports a yoke, then the yoke with more poles / drop arms are modelchecked as well.

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsCrossSection
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) mast profile (omp) [HEB200..280 | H3..H6 | B2..B6 | 240x240 | Ø260].

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsPoleHeight
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) mast height (omh) [mm], given in predefined lengths in 100 millimeter steps.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_OcsPoleHeight()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the height of the OCS pole, possibly adapted to carry a yoke.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_MAS_OcsPoleHeight() r,n = getRelatedObjects(rel_OcsPole_IsSupportFor_OcsPortal) if n > 0 then return string.format("%.0f", 500 * ((r[0].RelativeElevation + 1.0) // 0.5)) --[mm] else --Assume that the 3D library uses steps of 500 mm, assume using tall masts (for AT): return tostring(9500 - 500*math.floor((250 + 1000*RelativeElevation)//500)) --[mm] end end

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsPoleDepth
CustomAttribute.Description: Only applicable to wooden and concrete masts. The overhead catenary system (OCS) mast depth below ground reference level (omd) [mm].

CustomAttribute.Name: SupportArm
CustomAttribute.Description: True if the OCS pole features a support arm holding autotransformer conductors [True | False].

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_RelativeElevation()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the relative elevation 0 (lowest rail) for OCS pole. Delete this formula and adjust manually when other relative elevation is needed.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_mast_AngularOffset()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns an angular offset, to orient the (ordinary) mast colinear with its yoke (if any).

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_KlMast_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the 'Model3DName' for this KL mast.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_MAS_KlMast_Model3DName() if Variant == "Bjelkemast" then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-BJELKEMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-191x374xM36-"..OcsPoleHeight elseif Variant == "GMB-mast" then --TODO: Få ekte data for GMB-mastene, Lage 3D GMB-master return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-GMBMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-" ..OcsPoleHeight elseif Variant == "H-mast" then --Assume the 191x374 modern type: return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-GITTERMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-191x374xM36-"..OcsPoleHeight elseif Variant == "B-mast" then --Assume the 191x374 modern type: return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-GITTERMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-191x374xM36-"..OcsPoleHeight elseif Variant == "Betongmast" then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-BETONGMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-"..OcsPoleDepth.."-"..OcsPoleHeight elseif Variant == "Tremast" then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-TREMAST-" ..OcsCrossSection .."-"..OcsPoleDepth.."-"..OcsPoleHeight else return "Ukjent Variant ["..Variant.."]",_warning end end

ObjectType.Name: JBTEH_MAS Hengemast for bru og tunnel

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsCrossSection
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) suspension mast profile (smp) [ Sirkulær, Ø120 | Kvadratisk, 100x100 | Rektangulær, 100x150 | Rektangulær, 100x200 ].

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsPoleHeight
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) suspension mast height (smh) [mm], given in predefined lengths 0.5m - 5.0m in 50 millimeter steps.

CustomAttribute.Name: NewOrExisting
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) mast's age [Ny | Eksisterende].

CustomAttribute.Name: Spanlength
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length (sl) [m] denotes the distance traveled along the associated alignment's reference alignment (projected onto the XY plane) from this mast to the closest next mast, related using '"..rel_OcsPole_HasNext_OcsPole.."'/'"..rel_OcsPole_HasPrevious_OcsPole.."'.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthDisplay
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length value [m] being displayed close to the OCS pole.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetLateral
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text lateral offset along [m] denotes the distance, transversal to the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetAlong
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text along-offset [m] denotes the distance, along the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderBridgeOrTunnel_RelativeElevation()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the relative elevation for a OCS pole suspended from a yoke, based on the yoke's type and relative elevation.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderBridgeOrTunnel_RelativeElevation() s = rel_OcsPoleOrAnchoringFootplate_Has_OcsFoundation r,n = getRelatedObjects(s) if n == 0 then -- Belongs to a bridge underside (with no bolt group/foundation object), or has not (yet) received its bolt group relation: return 7.0, _info( "UNFINISHED - Relate mast with '"..rel_OcsPoleOrAnchoringFootplate_Has_OcsFoundation.."' to OCS ceiling bolt group, or delete formula and replace by actual relative height if bolt group is irrelevant.") else -- Has bolt group: return r[0].RelativeElevation, _info("Value obtained from foundation '"..RC__identify(r[0]).."'.") end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_tunnel_mast_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the 'Model3DName' for this OCS suspension mast.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_MAS_tunnel_mast_Model3DName() local h = (math.floor((250/2 + OcsPoleHeight) / 250)) * 250 -- Assume 3D models in steps of 250 mm if Variant == "Hengemast for bru og tunnel" then if (OcsCrossSection == "Sirkulær, Ø120") then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-HENGEMAST-FOR-BRU-OG-TUNNEL-350x350xM24-Ø120-"..h
elseif (OcsCrossSection == "Kvadratisk, 100x100") then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-HENGEMAST-FOR-BRU-OG-TUNNEL-350x350xM24-HUP-100x100-"..h
elseif (OcsCrossSection == "Rektangulær, 100x150") then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-HENGEMAST-FOR-BRU-OG-TUNNEL-350x350xM24-HUP-100x150-"..h
elseif (OcsCrossSection == "Rektangulær, 100x200") then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-HENGEMAST-FOR-BRU-OG-TUNNEL-350x350xM24-HUP-100x200-"..h end
elseif Variant:match("Hengemast Cariboni") then if (OcsCrossSection == "Rektangulær, 100x150") then return "NO-BN-3D-EH-MAS-HENGEMAST-FOR-BRU-OG-TUNNEL-350x350xM24-HUP-100x150-"..h end else
return "Bad OCS suspension mast Variant ["..Variant.."].",_warning end end

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_OtherObjectsToBeModelchecked
CustomAttribute.Description: When this OCS drop arm is refreshed, then its yoke with other OCS poles are modelchecked as well.

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsCrossSection
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) suspension mast profile (smp) [ Kvadratisk, 100x100 | Rektangulær, 100x150 | Rektangulær, 100x200 ].

CustomAttribute.Name: OcsPoleHeight
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) drop arm height, given in predefined lengths 1.0 - 5.0 m in 100 millimeter steps.

CustomAttribute.Name: DropArmAlongOffset
CustomAttribute.Description: The drop arm's offset from center of portal, colinear to the drop arm's own alignments' tangent direction.

CustomAttribute.Name: Spanlength
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length (sl) [m] denotes the distance traveled along the associated alignment's reference alignment (projected onto the XY plane) from this mast to the closest next mast, related using '"..rel_OcsPole_HasNext_OcsPole.."'/'"..rel_OcsPole_HasPrevious_OcsPole.."'.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthDisplay
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length value [m] being displayed close to the OCS pole.

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetLateral
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text lateral offset along [m] denotes the distance, transversal to the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

CustomAttribute.Name: SpanlengthTextOffsetAlong
CustomAttribute.Description: The span length(s) text along-offset [m] denotes the distance, along the mast's tangent direction, to offset the text element(s).

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_code()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the code for this OCS suspension mast.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_code() local yokeRelation = rel_OcsPole_IsDropArmUnder_OcsPortal local yokes, nYokes = getRelatedObjects(yokeRelation) if nYokes == 0 then return "UNFINISHED - Relate with '"..yokeRelation.."'." elseif nYokes > 1 then return _warning, "UNFINISHED - Suspended OCS pole belongs to more than one yoke " .." - remove unintended relations '"..yokeRelation.."' or adjust the active stage using layer names." else --One yoke: local supportMastRelation = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole local supportMasts, nSupportMasts = getRelatedObjects(supportMastRelation,yokes[0]) if nSupportMasts == 0 then return "UNFINISHED - Cannot deduce suspended OCS pole name since yoke '"..RC__identify(yokes[0]).."' has no support mast yet." else --Find the reference support mast - being closest to the yoke's own insertion point (there may be many yoke support masts): local i local shortestDist = math.huge local referenceSupportMast = nil for i = 0, nSupportMasts-1 do local newDist = RC__getDistance2D(yokes[0].geoCoord,supportMasts[i].geoCoord) if newDist < shortestDist then shortestDist = newDist referenceSupportMast = i end end
--Start suspended mast's code with support mast's code: local suspendedMastCode = supportMasts[referenceSupportMast].code
--Assign sequence number to this suspended OCS pole (counted from the support mast closest to yoke's insertion point): local suspendedMastRelation = rel_OcsPortal_IsDropArmSupportFor_OcsPole local suspendedMasts, nSuspendedMasts = getRelatedObjects(suspendedMastRelation,yokes[0])
local sequenceNumber = 0 for i = 0, nSuspendedMasts-1 do if suspendedMasts[i].id == this.id then sequenceNumber = i + 1 end end return supportMasts[referenceSupportMast].code..string.format("-%02d",sequenceNumber), _info("Code deduced from yoke '"..yokes[0].code.."' and its related components.") end end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_Mileage()
LuaFunction.Description: Deduces the yoke suspension mast's mileage, based on its relation to a yoke/galley and this one's support mast(s). If provided, the offset is added to the computed mileage.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_Mileage(offset) offset = offset or 0.0 --Note: The offset is "brutally" added to mileage, also when the yoke does not cross tracks at a straight angle. local ys = rel_OcsPole_IsDropArmUnder_OcsPortal local yr,yn = getRelatedObjects(ys) if yn == 0 then return getPropertyValue("Mileage"), _info("UNFINISHED - Relate to yoke/galley with '"..ys.."' to set mileage automatically.")
elseif yn > 1 then return _error,getPropertyValue("Mileage"), _info("ERROR - Suspension mast is related to more than one yoke ("..RC__identify(yr[0])..", "..RC__identify(yr[1])..").")
else --yn == 1
local s = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole local r,n = getRelatedObjects(s,yr[0]) if n == 0 then return offset + yr[0].mileage, _info("Mileage deduced from yoke/galley lacking support mast(s) '"..RC__identify(yr[0]).."'.")
elseif n == 1 then --Galley: return offset + RC__getMileageFromRelatedObject(s,yr[0]), _info("Mileage deduced from support mast '"..RC__identify(r[0]).."'.")
elseif n >= 2 then --Our mast is suspended from a yoke yr[0] being supported by OCS poles r[0] and r[1]: local m1 = r[0] local m2 = r[1] -- Not needed: if RC__getDistance2D(this,m1) > RC__getDistance2D(this,m2) then m1,m2 = m2,m1 end local x1 = m1.geoCoord.X local y1 = m1.geoCoord.Y local dx = m2.geoCoord.X - x1 local dy = m2.geoCoord.Y - y1
--Find point Q on the straight line betweeen m1 and m2 with the yoke suspension mast's specified DistanceToAlignment: function err(t) local Qx = x1+t*dx local Qy = y1+t*dy return getAlignmentInfo(Alignment.id,Qx,Qy).DistanceToAlignment - this.DistanceToAlignment end local tq = getZeros(err,{tolerance = 1e-4, interval = {0,1}, timeLimit = 3})[0] local Qx = x1 + tq*dx local Qy = y1 + tq*dy return offset + getAlignmentInfo(Alignment.id,Qx,Qy).Mileage end end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_RelativeElevation()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the relative elevation for a drop arm under a portal, based on the portal's type and relative elevation.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_RelativeElevation() local s,r,n,e,v local extensionAboveTopOfYoke = 0.10 local r,n = getRelatedObjects(rel_OcsPole_IsDropArmUnder_OcsPortal) if n == 0 then return 0.0, _info("UNFINISHED - Relate with '"..rel_OcsPole_IsDropArmUnder_OcsPortal.."' to its OCS portal.") else local e = (r[0].geoCoord.Z - getAlignmentInfo().Elevation) --Portal's elevation above this drop arm's own alignment local v = r[0].Variant if v == "Type 12" then return e + 0.8 + extensionAboveTopOfYoke elseif v == "Utliggeråk" then return e + 0.8 + extensionAboveTopOfYoke --Uses Type 12, 6m. elseif v == "Type 14" then return e + 1.2 + extensionAboveTopOfYoke elseif v == "Type 40" then return e + 0.4 + extensionAboveTopOfYoke else return 0.0,_error, _info("Bad related OCS yoke '"..RC__identify(r[0]).."' Variant: ["..v.."].") end end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_AngularOffset()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns an angular offset, to orient the mast colinear with its yoke (if any).

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_MAS_DropArmUnderPortal_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Obtains the 'Model3DName' for this OCS suspension mast.

CustomAttribute.Name: Length
CustomAttribute.Description: The overhead catenary system (OCS) yoke length (oyl), given in predefined lengths in 1 meter steps. Each may be composed of subparts, where the joints may hinder suspension mast mounting.

CustomAttribute.Name: mc_OtherObjectsToBeModelchecked
CustomAttribute.Description: When this yoke is refreshed, then all of its support masts and suspension masts are modelchecked as well.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_otherObjectsToModelcheck()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the number of other items to modelcheck, and a table with references to them.
LuaFunction.Formula: function _JBTEH_AAK_otherObjectsToModelcheck() sMast = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole rMast,nMast = getRelatedObjects(sMast) t = {} --Collection of other objects to check first = true for i = 0, nMast-1 do table.insert(t,rMast[i]) txt = first and "{"..RC__identify(rMast[i]) or txt..","..RC__identify(rMast[i]) first = false end sSuspensionMast = rel_OcsPortal_IsDropArmSupportFor_OcsPole rSuspensionMast,nSuspensionMast = getRelatedObjects(sSuspensionMast) for i = 0, nSuspensionMast-1 do table.insert(t,rSuspensionMast[i]) txt = first and "{"..RC__identify(rSuspensionMast[i]) or txt..","..RC__identify(rSuspensionMast[i]) first = false end n = nMast + nSuspensionMast if n == 0 then return 0,{},_info("{}") else return n,t,_info(n..": "..txt.."}") end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_DistanceToAlignment()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the distance to alignment for the yoke.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_AAK_DistanceToAlignment() -- Ref Bane NOR, lærebok "Bygging av kontaktledningsanlegg" Del 2:2, Kap. 14
function _JBTEH_AAK_get_mastDistanceToAlignment(mast) if mast.Alignment == nil then return RightSided and 4e-4 or -4e-4,_warning, _info("Closest OCS support mast is not connected to a track (own alignment).") else local mv = mast.Variant local mp = mast.OcsCrossSection local d if mv:match("Bjelkemast") then d = string.sub(mp,4,6)/2000 --Assume mast profile names "HEB200", "HEB220" etc elseif mv:match("GMB%-mast") then d = string.sub(mp,4,6)/2000 --Assume mast profile names "HEB200", "HEB220" etc TODO: Finn ekte profiler for GMB-mast elseif mv:match("B%-mast") then d = (mast.OcsPoleHeight - RelativeElevation) * math.tan(23/1000000) elseif mv:match("H%-mast") then d = (mast.OcsPoleHeight - RelativeElevation) * math.tan(1/50000) elseif mv:lower():match("hengemast") then if (mp == 'Sirkulær, Ø120') then d = 0.06 elseif (mp == 'Kvadratisk, 100x100') then d = 0.05 elseif (mp == 'Rektangulær, 100x150') then d = 0.075 elseif (mp == 'Rektangulær, 100x200') then d = 0.1 else return 0,_warning, _info("Bad OCS pole profile ["..mp.."].") end else return 0,_warning, _info("Bad OCS pole variant ["..mv.."].") end -- OCS pole and yoke may belong to different tracks (when OCS pole is located between tracks): mdist = getAlignmentInfo(alignment.id,mast.geoCoord.X,mast.geoCoord.Y).DistanceToAlignment --Distance from center closest OCS pole to yoke's alignment if (mast.RightSided) then if (mast.Alignment.id == Alignment.id) then return mdist-d else return mdist+d end else if (mast.Alignment.id == Alignment.id) then return mdist+d else return mdist-d end end end end --function
local s = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole local r,n = getRelatedObjects(s)
if n == 0 then if Variant == "Utliggeråk" then --Merk: Utliggeråk benytter en 6m mellomramme for Åk type 12. return getPropertyValue("DistanceToAlignment"),_warning, _info("UNFINISHED: Relate galley to an OCS pole with relation '"..s.."'.") else return getPropertyValue("DistanceToAlignment"),_warning, _info( "UNFINISHED: Relate yoke to OCS pole(s) with relation '"..s.."', or change Variant to galley (Utliggeråk).") end
elseif n == 1 then if Variant == "Utliggeråk" then --Merk: Utliggeråk benytter en 6m mellomramme for Åk type 12. return _JBTEH_AAK_get_mastDistanceToAlignment(r[0]), _info("Galley yoke (Utliggeråk) extending from mast '"..RC__identify(r[0]).."'.") else return getPropertyValue("DistanceToAlignment"),_warning, _info( "UNFINISHED: Relate yoke to one more OCS pole with relation '"..rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole.."', or change Variant to galley (Utliggeråk).") end
elseif n >= 2 then local m1 = r[0] local m2 = r[1] if RC__getDistance2D(this,m1) > RC__getDistance2D(this,m2) then m1,m2 = m2,m1 end local d1 = RC__getDistance2D(m1,m2) local L = math.floor(1.500 + d1) --Assume min 0.5 and max 1.5 meter total yoke length overshoot local d2 = 0.5 * (L - d1) --Share overshoot between masts local x1 = m1.geoCoord.X local y1 = m1.geoCoord.Y local x2 = m2.geoCoord.X local y2 = m2.geoCoord.Y local x = x1 - (d2/d1)*(x2-x1) local y = y1 - (d2/d1)*(y2-y1) local info = "Distance to alignment deduced through support mast '"..RC__identify(m1).."' related by '"..s.."'." return getAlignmentInfo(Alignment.id,x,y).DistanceToAlignment, _info(info) end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_Length()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the length of the yoke, being the mast-mast center distance plus 1.50 meter, rounded down.
LuaFunction.Formula:
function _JBTEH_AAK_Length() -- Ref Bane NOR, lærebok "Bygging av kontaktledningsanlegg" Del 2:2, Kap. 14 local RelationName = rel_OcsPortal_IsSupportedBy_OcsPole local r,n = getRelatedObjects(RelationName) local L if n == 0 then if Variant == "Utliggeråk" then --Merk: Utliggeråk benytter en 6m mellomramme for Åk type 12. Se sammenstillingstegning E-7507 = EH-707507, samt mellomramme 6m type 12 = EH-707448. L = "6m" return L,_warning, _info("UNFINISHED: Relate galley to an OCS pole with relation '"..RelationName.."'.") else if Variant == "Type 12" then L = "11m" elseif Variant == "Type 14" then L = "28m" elseif Variant == "Type 40" then L = "10m" end return L,_warning, _info( "UNFINISHED: Relate yoke to OCS pole(s) with relation '"..RelationName.."', or change Variant to galley (Utliggeråk).") end
elseif n == 1 then local m1 = r[0] if Variant == "Utliggeråk" then return "6m", _info("Galley yoke (Utliggeråk) extending from mast "..m1.code..".") else if Variant == "Type 12" then L = "11m" elseif Variant == "Type 14" then L = "28m" elseif Variant == "Type 40" then L = "10m" end return L,_warning, _info( "UNFINISHED: Relate yoke to one more OCS pole with relation 'Har åk-mast / kl-mast', or change Variant to galley (Utliggeråk).") end
elseif n >= 2 then local m1 = r[0] local m2 = r[1] local P1 = m1.geoCoord local P2 = m2.geoCoord local len = RC__getDistance2D(P1,P2) L = math.floor(len + 1.5) if Variant == "Type 12" then if L < 11 then return "11m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 12 yokes can't be shorter than 11 meter. Change to type 40 or galley (Utliggeråk).") elseif L > 33 then return "33m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 12 yokes can't be longer than 33 meter, change to Type 14.") end elseif Variant == "Type 14" then if L < 28 then return "28m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 14 yokes can't be made shorter than 28 meter. Change to Type 12 or 40.") elseif L > 43 then return "43m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 14 yokes can't be made longer than 43 meter.") end elseif Variant == "Type 40" then if L < 10 then return "10m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 40 yokes can't be made shorter than 10 meter. Change to galley (Utliggeråk).") elseif L > 16 then return "16m",_warning, _info("L="..L.." required, but Type 40 yokes can't be made longer than 16 meter, change to Type 12 or 14.") end else return getPropertyValue("Length"),_error, _info("Remove excess yoke support mast(s), or change yoke Variant into Type 12/14/40.") end return L.."m", _info("Length deduced from mast "..m1.code.." and "..m2.code.." ("..RC__round(len,3).." m).") end end

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_AngularOffset()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the angular offset needed to orient the yoke between its two masts, or a galley according to its mast.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_Mileage()
LuaFunction.Description: Deduces the galley's / yoke's mileage, based on relation to one or two yoke support masts.

LuaFunction.Name: _JBTEH_AAK_Model3DName()
LuaFunction.Description: Returns the yoke's 3D object model name.

SymbolDefinition.BlockNameFormat: NO-BN-2D-JBTEH_AAK KONTAKTLEDNINGSÅK {% if Variant == 'Utliggeråk' %}UTLIGGERÅK-6000 {% elsif Length == '10m' %}10000 {% elsif Length == '11m' %}11000 {% elsif Length == '12m' %}12000 {% elsif Length == '13m' %}13000 {% elsif Length == '14m' %}14000 {% elsif Length == '15m' %}15000 {% elsif Length == '16m' %}16000 {% elsif Length == '17m' %}17000 {% elsif Length == '18m' %}18000 {% elsif Length == '19m' %}19000 {% elsif Length == '20m' %}20000 {% elsif Length == '21m' %}21000 {% elsif Length == '22m' %}22000 {% elsif Length == '23m' %}23000 {% elsif Length == '24m' %}24000 {% elsif Length == '25m' %}25000 {% elsif Length == '26m' %}26000 {% elsif Length == '27m' %}27000 {% elsif Length == '28m' %}28000 {% elsif Length == '29m' %}29000 {% elsif Length == '30m' %}30000 {% elsif Length == '31m' %}31000 {% elsif Length == '32m' %}32000 {% elsif Length == '33m' %}33000 {% elsif Length == '34m' %}34000 {% elsif Length == '35m' %}35000 {% elsif Length == '36m' %}36000 {% elsif Length == '37m' %}37000 {% elsif Length == '38m' %}38000 {% elsif Length == '39m' %}39000 {% elsif Length == '40m' %}40000 {% elsif Length == '41m' %}41000 {% elsif Length == '42m' %}42000 {% elsif Length == '43m' %}43000 {% else %}BAD_Variant_{{Variant}} {% endif %} {% if SymbolMode == 'Schematic' %}Schematic{% else %}Metric{% endif %}
